source_text: A Net Smelter Royalty held by Loded Dog is currently in place with respect to E28/2513 at a rate of 1.5% for gold and 1% for all other minerals.
additional_details: This royalty is held by Loded Dog and applies to tenement E28/2513. It is payable by West Cobar (WC1) upon completion of the acquisition of E28/2513.
